entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear early in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
